title: Understanding Feasibility
text: Feasibility refers to the practicality of a research question, considering factors like time, resources, and access to data.

title: Evaluating Research Questions
text: What is a key consideration when determining the feasibility of a research question?

title: Defining Personal Interest
text: Personal interest in a research topic can drive motivation and engagement, but it should be balanced with other factors like feasibility and significance.

hintAnswer: To ensure the research is both engaging and practical to conduct.
title: Balancing Interest and Feasibility
text: Why is it important to balance personal interest with feasibility when selecting a research question?
choices: To ensure the research is both engaging and practical to conduct.
To focus solely on topics of personal interest.
To prioritize feasibility over all other factors.
